backend/main.mo: Manages user profiles, app passwords, and unlock sessions with access control and session timeout logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence metadata mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for various frontend files used in build planning.
frontend/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for frontend dependencies, builds, environment files, IDE files, OS artifacts, logs, and mobile build outputs.
frontend/android/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to keep the android directory in version control.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration defining app ID, web output dir, mobile schemes, and plugin settings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point defining meta tags, PWA manifest, icons, and root mount point.
frontend/ios/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to keep the ios directory in version control.
frontend/MOBILE_RELEASE.md: Guide describing steps to package and submit the Thunderlab mobile app for iOS and Android.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, and startup behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes, theme provider, and wraps the app with layout and notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and cache clearing.
Route guard that enforces authentication and unlock status while allowing admins to bypass unlocking.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders a footer with the current year and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout including navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Displays navigation with conditional rendering based on authentication and links to key app sections.
frontend/src/components/settings/AppPass: Provides UI and logic for changing, resetting, and locking the app password using associated hooks.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/audioEn: Implements a Web Audio–based engine to synthesize kick, snare, and hihat sounds and play sequenced steps.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/renderT: Renders a drum pattern offline into a WAV file using Web Audio and returns the encoded blob and filename.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/useStep: Manages beat‑maker state, pattern editing, playback timing, and interaction with the AudioEngine.
frontend/src/features/beat-maker/wavEnco: Encodes an AudioBuffer into a 16‑bit PCM WAV blob by writing headers and interleaving audio data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppPassword.ts: Manages unlocking and saving the app password by hashing input, calling backend actor methods, and updating unlock-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppPasswordManagem: Provides password change, lock, and reset flows using useAppPassword and actor methods, updating queries and navigation accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller’s backend-defined role and admin status via react-query, defaulting to guest on errors; also provides a simplified admin check hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useCapacitorDeepLinks: Empty placeholder file for handling Capacitor deep links.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider for login, identity loading, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries and mutations for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlockStatus.ts: Queries whether the current user session is unlocked, defaulting to locked on errors and keying by principal.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes plus base and utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/backendCallWithUnlock.t: Wraps backend calls to detect locked errors and redirect to the unlock page while preserving return paths.
frontend/src/lib/lockedError.ts: Detects backend 'locked' errors by checking common lock-related message strings.
frontend/src/lib/projectAudioImport.ts: Stub for importing audio into projects, logging request details and throwing until implemented.
frontend/src/lib/returnToContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears a return-to path in sessionStorage for post-unlock navigation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BeatMakerPage.tsx: UI for a beat-making page allowing sequencing, playback, WAV export, and preparing beats for project import.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that authenticates with Internet Identity and redirects users based on admin role, while displaying app features and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Displays the user's projects with an empty state prompt and options to create new projects along with basic feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page showing user profile info, app password management, and an about section for the Thunderlab app.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: Account unlock flow handling password entry or creation, with redirects based on auth, admin status, and unlock state.
frontend/src/security/hashAppPassword.ts: Implements PBKDF2-based password hashing using WebCrypto and returns a hex‑encoded hash.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the current Thunderlab project state, including versioning, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of implemented features with associated requirements.
